deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
A simple and powerful layer 2 smartcontract for ERC721 NFT.
Use this contract to assign a specific IPFS Hash to NFT Tokens, this ipfs file can
include NFT story, Race, Birth Date and other info that can be updated by the Token's owner.
Contract support both IERC721 and IERC20 interfaces, this mean that user can update their
NFT hash using both ERC20 Tokens and Governance Token ( ETH, CRO ecc )

userdoc.notice: A simple and powerful layer 2 smartcontract for ERC721 NFT. Use this contract to assign a specific IPFS Hash to NFT Tokens, this ipfs file can include NFT story, Race, Birth Date and other info that can be updated by the Token's owner. Contract support both IERC721 and IERC20 interfaces, this mean that user can update their NFT hash using both ERC20 Tokens and Governance Token ( ETH, CRO ecc )
